Sentencas: Voltage losses in fuel cells and other solid electrolyte systems are due to several mass transport and kinetics processes at the electrode/electrolyte interface as well as to ohmic contributions from the electrolyte, electrodes, current collectors and contact resistances.
Titulo: Evaluation of solid electrolyte cells with a versatile electrochemical technique

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) has been in use for several decades in fuel cell research and is quite effective in determining the contribution of individual electrode and electrolyte processes.
Titulo: Evaluation of solid electrolyte cells with a versatile electrochemical technique

Sentencas: However, data acquisition and analysis can be time-consuming and the technique has many limitations whilst cell performance and operating conditions are varying rapidly with time especially when the cells are under current load.
Titulo: Evaluation of solid electrolyte cells with a versatile electrochemical technique

Sentencas: The galvanostatic current interruption (GCI) technique is fast and can be used under a wide range of operating as well as for rapidly varying loads and cell performance conditions.
Titulo: Evaluation of solid electrolyte cells with a versatile electrochemical technique

Sentencas: In this paper a totally new and very simple way of adapting commercially available equipment has been described to perform high quality, reliable and fast GCI measurements over a range of different currents in one sequence without having to use an electronic switch or a solid state relay or a separate fast data logging system.
Titulo: Evaluation of solid electrolyte cells with a versatile electrochemical technique

Sentencas: Its versatility has been demonstrated with a number of standard RC circuits simulating slow electrode and fast electrolyte processes and by evaluating a number of solid oxide fuel cell materials.
Titulo: Evaluation of solid electrolyte cells with a versatile electrochemical technique

Sentencas: The GCI technique has been shown to be able to determine the composition of all standard test circuits within +/- 1 % of those determined from the EIS technique and actual values of circuit components.
Titulo: Evaluation of solid electrolyte cells with a versatile electrochemical technique

Sentencas: The technique has been applied to investigating solid electrolyte cells and produced excellent results.
Titulo: Evaluation of solid electrolyte cells with a versatile electrochemical technique
